sense.def:
To possess something
pomeni nekaj imeti ali biti lastnik nečesa.

seg.quote: How I longed to possess a suit like that.
They were found guilty of possessing petrol bombs.

sense.def:
To possess a quality, ability, or feature
pomeni imeti določeno lastnost, sposobnost ali značilnost.

seg.quote: He possessed the qualities of a war leader.
For hundreds of years London possessed only one bridge.
